name: StyledOn
tag_list: fashion, style, social-network, social-community, fashion-community, fashion-startups, leora-kadisha, fashion-network, brands
overview:
StyledOn is the web’s premier style-centric social network.

In less than one year, it has been named “Best of the Web” by InStyle Magazine and, according to The New York Times Style Magazine, it is “quickly becoming the Facebook for the fashion set.”

Facilitating a true exchange of images and ideas, StyledOn is a platform of social discovery for style-minded individuals and brands alike. Members share and tag images to build their own personal portfolio and to inspire the discovery in others. StyledOn attracts a robust international community that can connect with one another based on individual style and preferences.

Join StyledOn now to declare your style! Create a profile, tag inspiring images, and engage with the community. This is a community made for those who not only want to know about what’s fashionable and fresh, but want to have a say in it as well and connect with the brands they love. After all, your style is a window into your personality — why not give our world a look inside?
